svg.text: Systematic Integration with Three Approaches and Multiple Model Sizes

g.text: ‚Ä¢ Benefits: Clean architecture, stable training, +3-8% mAP
python train_yolov12_dino.py --data coco.yaml --yolo-size s --dino-variant vitb16 --integration single --epochs 100
python train_yolov12_dino.py --data coco.yaml --yolo-size l --dino-variant vitl16 --integration dual --epochs 200

svg.text: YOLOv12 + DINOv3: Systematic Vision Transformer Integration for Enhanced Object Detection
